ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: InnerClassesCannotBeStatic
rule.message: Inner classes cannot be static in Apex. Remove the static modifier from inner class declarations
rule.description: Inner classes in Apex cannot be static. This is a language limitation - Apex does not support static inner classes. Remove the static modifier from inner class declarations. This is a compilation error that will prevent the code from compiling.
